findings.title: Broad definitions may expand obligations
findings.rationale: Overly broad defined terms can expand confidentiality or scope beyond what you expect.
findings.matched_excerpt: ...CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION Confidential Information means all proprietary information disclosed by one party to the other, including technical data, business strategies, customer information, and financial information....
findings.exact_snippet: means all proprietary information disclosed by one party to the other, including
findings.context:
Company A and Company B.

PURPOSE
The parties wish to explore potential business opportunities and may disclose confidential information to each other.

CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION
Confidential Information means all proprietary information disclosed by one party to the other, including technical data, business strategies, customer information, and financial information.

OBLIGATIONS
Each party agrees to:
(a) Maintain strict confidentiality
(b) Not use the information for any pur

changes: Added 8 high-signal rules (attorneys fees, liability cap carveouts, assignment restrictions, etc.)
Implemented clause-level anchoring and false-positive suppression
